scripts.build: npm run clean && cp src/index.html docs/index.html && npm run build:setup-guide && npm run build:js-client
scripts.build:setup-guide: cd src/frame-setup-guide && bundle exec middleman build --clean && cp -R build ../../docs/frame-setup-guide
scripts.build:js-client: cd src/js-client && bundle exec middleman build --clean && cp -R build ../../docs/js-client
